name: home
description:
You are in your home.
Its dimly lit but cozy.
The light from an old lamp beside a cozy armchair pools softly over a stack of books,
inviting anyone to curl up with a cup of tea or coffee.
Every corner feels like a sanctuary, a quiet world where time slows down,
and every object seems to have its own story to tell.
There is a front door and a back door.
There is a fire place here.

name: Your Frontdoor
description:
You are standing just outside your front door.
There is a dirt road.
You can go left or right.

name: Far down the Road
description:
You move left down the road until you come to a large tree.
The tree is very big and very old.

name: Up the Road
description:
You move right down the road.
Looks like trouble up ahead...

name: Up in the Tree
description:
You climb the tree.
You can see everything from up here.

name: Clearing along the Road
description:
You are in a clearing along the road.
There is a lot of open space.

name: Dead End after the Tree
description:
The road comes to a dead end after the tree.
But there is a path.
You could also follow the squirrel into the woods.

name: Path in the Woods
description:
You are on a small path in the woods
It looks like there is a small cottage up ahead.

name: Long Stretch of Road near town
description:
You are on a long stretch of road.
You are near town.
There is also a small path.

name: Old Man Jeffers
description:
You come across old man Jeffers residence.
He has a garden and a fireplace.

name: Old Man Jeffers Garden
description:
You are in old man Jeffers garden.
There is a tomatoe plant.

name: Town Square
description:
You are in the town square.
There is a store here and a few paths.

name: Mom and Pop Shop
description:
You are in a small store.
Buy items.

name: Mirkwood Entrance
description:
You take a small path to the entrance of Mirkwood forest.
All the trees seem to be dead.
The air is heavy with mist,
and the silence is broken only by the occasional rustle of unseen creatures.
A sense of unease lingers,
as if the forest itself watches those who enter.

name: Cave Entrance
description:
You take a path to a cave.
You are standing at the entrance of the cave.

name: Middle of the Cave
description: You are in a cave.

name: Deep in the Cave
description:
You are deep inside a cave.
There is a door here but it is locked.

name: Mirkwood treeline
description:
You are on a path through Mirkwood.
The path is long.

name: Mirkwood path
description:
You are on a path through Mirkwood.
There is a clearing up ahead.

name: Mirkwood clearing
description:
You are in a clearing in Mirkwood.
The exit is nearby.

name: Mirkwood exit
description:
You are just outside Mirkwood.
There is a road sign with many directions.
You can take many paths here.

name: Small Wooden House
description:
You stand before a small wooden house,
its weathered planks bearing the marks of time and countless storms.
The roof,
patched with moss and stray shingles,
slopes gently, giving the structure a quaint, inviting charm.
There is a woman here.

name: Your Backyard
description:
You are in your back yard.
There is a path into the woods.

name: Path in the Woods
description:
You take the path deep into the woods.
The path continues to a garden.
There is also a deep river nearby. Too deep to cross to the other side...

name: Wild Garden
description:
You are in a wild garden with lots of plants to choose from.
There is an apple tree here.
There is a shed nearby but the door is locked.

name: Bramblethorn Overlook
description:
The view is quite impressive.
You can see out over much of the forest and a river.
There is a bridge nearby.

name: Ironwood Clearing
description:
The road opens up into a rare, serene clearing.
There is a lot of space.
The air is heavy with a quiet power, a feeling that this place is not entirely of the natural world.
There is a small shed nearby, but the door is locked.

name: Echoing Hollow
description:
You are at Echoing Hollow.
Its very windy here.
But if you shout, you can hear the echo...

name: Cinderspire
description:
A jagged, smoke-streaked peak that towers over the charred landscape.
The air is thick with ash, and the remnants of ancient fires flicker faintly at the summit..
There is a fireplace built into the rock.

name: Gardening Shed
description:
You are in a small gardening shed.
There are some tools and some soil.

name: Workman's Shed
description:
You are in a small gardening shed.
There are some tools and some soil.

name: Other Side of the River
description:
You cross the river to the otherside.
There is a trail here.

name: Old Man McCann's
description:
Old man McCann's residence.
There is a path to a small garden.
There is a fireplace here.

name: Town of Wrenwood
description:
You are in Wrenwood.
There is a store here.
There are a few houses nearby.

name: Trail in the woods
description:
You follow the trail into the woods.
You are near Wrenwood.

name: General Store
description: A small store where you can buy potions.

name: Old man McCann's Garden
description:
You are in old man McCann's nice garden.
There are lots of plants to choose from.
There is a tomatoe plant.
There is also a shed here but the door is locked.

name: McCann's Shed
description:
You are in a small gardening shed.
There are some tools and some soil.

name: Deep in the Woods
description: You are Lost in the woods.

name: Lost in the Woods
description: You are Lost in the woods.

name: Lost in the Deep Woods
description:
You are Lost deep in the woods.
As you walk further, suddenly the brush subsides.
There seems to be a small garden up ahead.

name: Bridge near Bramblethorn Overlook
description:
You make your way to the bridge.
A scenic crossing point over serene waters,
where the wooden slats creak with the
whispers of secrets shared between friends.

name: Town of Williams
description:
You are in the town of Williams.
Its very nice here.
There is a small store here.
Town hall is nearby but the door is locked.
A small road leads north out of town.

name: Williams General Store
description:
You are in a small store.
Buy items.

name: Williams Town Hall
description:
You are in Williams Town Hall.
There is a fire place here.

name: Road north of Williams
description:
You walk along the road north of Willams until you reach a split.
You can go north, east, west, or south back to Williams.

name: Stack Homestead
description:
You are at the Stack Homestead.
There is a mountain to the north.
On the farside of the homestead, there is a river.
The river is too deep to cross.
There is a pumpkin patch.
There is a fireplace here.

name: Elderfern Forest Entrance
description:
You walk until you reach the entrance to Elderfern Forest.
The winding paths through Elderfern are often shrouded in mist,
making it easy to lose one's way and harder still to shake
the feeling of being watched by unseen eyes.

name: Emberfell Castle Entrance
description:
You are outside of Emberfell castle.
Its blackened stone walls rising dramatically against the backdrop of a stormy sky.
Once a stronghold of ancient kings,
it is now a haunting silhouette in the mist.
The door is locked.

name: Elderfern Forest Clearing
description: You are lost in the forest.

name: Elderfern Forest Path
description: You are lost in the forest.

name: Elderfern Forest Brush
description: You are lost in the forest.

name: Elderfern Forest
description: You are lost in the forest.

name: The Emberhall
description:
You are in the grand entrance hall,
where flickering torches cast long shadows on the stone walls.
The echoes of footsteps seem to linger long after someone has passed through.

name: The Chamber of Ashes
description:
A small, private room where the remains of past monarchs are kept in urns.
A haunting silence fills the air,
broken only by the occasional gust of wind through the cracks in the walls.
The ashes are said to hold the spirits of the fallen,
their whispers faint but ever present.

name: The Library of Forgotten Lore
description:
An immense, dusty library,
filled with ancient tomes, scrolls, and forbidden texts.
The bookshelves are stacked high with knowledge lost to time,
and some say the books themselves can whisper dark secrets if one listens closely enough.

name: The Forgotten Garden
description:
A once beautiful garden now overrun with tangled vines,
twisted trees,
and flowers that bloom in strange, otherworldly colors.
There is a tomatoe plant here.

name: Spiral Staircase
description: You are on a large spiral staricase. You can go up or down.

name: The Dungeon of Emberfell
description:
You take the staircase down, beneath the castle.
Shackles and chains still hang from the walls,
and the faint sound of water dripping echoes throughout.
It is said that those imprisoned here were never meant to leave.

name: The Ashen Tower
description:
You climb the spiral staircase all the way to the top of the castle.
There is a small room at the top.
The room contains a large treasure chest, but it is locked.

name: Road outside Emberfell Dungeon
description:
You are just outside Emberfell Castle.
You can enter through the dungeon.
You can also go north, east or west.

name: Alistair Grey's House
description:
You are at Alistair Grey's House.
Alistair is here.
He looks at you and says 'I am looking for some good books,
If you find any and bring them to me,
I will make it worth your while'.

name: Across the river from the Stack Homestead
description:
You are on the other side of the river from the Stack Homestead.
There is a path...

name: The Celestial Observatory
description:
You take the path to the Observatory.
Its stone walls, adorned with celestial carvings,
are weathered but sturdy, exuding an air of forgotten knowledge.
Inside, a grand telescope dominates the room,
its crystal lenses glowing faintly as it seems to reach for the stars.
The observatory is filled with dusty tomes, celestial maps, and mysterious artifacts,
all hinting at arcane studies of the heavens.

name: Crystal Caverns
description:
A breathtaking underground realm of glittering beauty and eerie silence.
The walls of the cavern are lined with towering,
translucent crystals that glow with an ethereal light,
casting prismatic reflections across the dark, winding tunnels.
There is a door here but it is locked.

name: Ancient Tombs
description:
A dark, forgotten burial ground carved into the heart of a desolate hillside.
The air is heavy with the scent of dust and decay as stone doorways lead into shadowed chambers,
where the remains of long-dead rulers and warriors lie undisturbed.
Faded carvings and crumbling inscriptions line the walls,
telling tales of a lost civilization.

name: The Enchanted Village
description:
A quaint, seemingly timeless settlement hidden deep within the forest.
Its cobblestone streets are lined with charming cottages,
their windows glowing warmly with light.
There is a fire place here.

name: Skyward Peaks
description:
Towering, snow capped mountains that pierce the sky,
their jagged summits lost in the clouds.
The air is thin and cold, and the winds howl through the rocky passes.
Only the most daring travelers attempt the climb.

name: Ancient Glyphs
description:
Faded symbols etched into stone, their meanings long lost to time.
They pulse faintly with an otherworldly energy,
hinting at forgotten knowledge and hidden power,
waiting for someone to decipher their secrets.

name: Forsaken Road
description:
A desolate, overgrown path,
once traveled but now abandoned.
Cracked stone and twisted roots litter the way,
and an eerie silence hangs in the air,
as if the road itself has been forgotten by time.
The road continues north but a large chasm blocks you from continuing.

name: Hidden Passage
description:
A secret, very long, narrow tunnel beneath the earth,
its entrance concealed by rubble and roots.
The air is damp and musty,
and the faint echo of footsteps suggests forgotten travelers once walked this path.
You can go east or west.

name: Enchanted Village Store
description:
You are in a small store.
Buy items.

name: Forsaken Road North
description: You walk for miles along the northern end of the Forsaken Road.

name: Stoneheart Mountain
description:
You climb Stoneheart Mountain to the top.
The towering peak's slopes are blanketed in thick, glistening white drifts.
The jagged cliffs rise sharply against the sky,
their dark stone contrasted by the endless stretch of frost and ice.
Winds whip through the mountain's high passes,
carrying with them the bite of the cold
Its too steep to climb back down.
But the south is less steep,
and there is a path that leads down the mountain.

name: The Whispering Marsh Entrance
description:
Entrance to The Whispering Marsh.
Its rumored to be the home of ogres.
Enter if you dare...

name: The Whispering Marsh
description:
A vast,
fog-covered swamp where the wind seems to carry faint whispers from all directions.
The ground is treacherous,
and strange,
glowing lights float above the muck.

name: The Whispering Marsh
description:
A vast,
fog-covered swamp where the wind seems to carry faint whispers from all directions.
The ground is treacherous,
and strange,
glowing lights float above the muck.

name: The Whispering Marsh
description:
A vast,
fog-covered swamp where the wind seems to carry faint whispers from all directions.
The ground is treacherous,
and strange,
glowing lights float above the muck.

name: The Whispering Marsh
description:
A vast,
fog-covered swamp where the wind seems to carry faint whispers from all directions.
The ground is treacherous,
and strange,
glowing lights float above the muck.

name: The Whispering Marsh
description:
A vast,
fog-covered swamp where the wind seems to carry faint whispers from all directions.
The ground is treacherous,
and strange,
glowing lights float above the muck.

name: The Whispering Marsh
description:
A vast,
fog-covered swamp where the wind seems to carry faint whispers from all directions.
The ground is treacherous,
and strange,
glowing lights float above the muck.

name: The Whispering Marsh
description:
A vast,
fog-covered swamp where the wind seems to carry faint whispers from all directions.
The ground is treacherous,
and strange,
glowing lights float above the muck.

name: The Whispering Marsh
description:
A vast,
fog-covered swamp where the wind seems to carry faint whispers from all directions.
The ground is treacherous,
and strange,
glowing lights float above the muck.

name: The Whispering Marsh
description:
A vast,
fog-covered swamp where the wind seems to carry faint whispers from all directions.
The ground is treacherous,
and strange,
glowing lights float above the muck.

name: The Whispering Marsh
description:
A vast,
fog-covered swamp where the wind seems to carry faint whispers from all directions.
The ground is treacherous,
and strange,
glowing lights float above the muck.

name: The Whispering Marsh
description:
A vast,
fog-covered swamp where the wind seems to carry faint whispers from all directions.
The ground is treacherous,
and strange,
glowing lights float above the muck.

name: The Whispering Marsh
description:
A vast,
fog-covered swamp where the wind seems to carry faint whispers from all directions.
The ground is treacherous,
and strange,
glowing lights float above the muck.

name: The Whispering Marsh
description:
A vast,
fog-covered swamp where the wind seems to carry faint whispers from all directions.
The ground is treacherous,
and strange,
glowing lights float above the muck.

name: The Whispering Marsh Exit
description: You can head south back into the marsh, or north...

name: Town of Hearthstone
description:
Hearthstone is a charming town nestled in a peaceful valley.
With its cozy cottages, lush farmlands, and scenic countryside, it exudes a warm, welcoming atmosphere.
The quiet streets are lined with flower-filled gardens,
and the air is fresh with the scent of nearby forests and fields.

name: Willow and Wares
description:
You are in a small store.
Buy items.

name: Thistlehill Cottage
description:
Thistlehill Cottage is a charming little retreat perched on a hillside,
surrounded by wildflowers and the gentle rustle of the breeze.

name: Sunbeam Cottage
description:
A bright, welcoming home bathed in natural light.
With its large windows that let the sun spill in,
the cottage feels warm and cheerful all year round.
Inside are soft wooden beams and colorful, hand-crafted decor

name: Baker Farm
description:
The Baker Farm is a cozy,
picturesque homestead nestled at the edge of Hearthstone,
where the sweet scent of fresh bread and earthy fields mingle in the air.
The farmhouse,
with its red-brick chimney and whitewashed walls,
stands proudly beside neat rows of crops and flourishing orchards.
There is a beet plant here.

name: Old Man Aj's
description:
Old Man Aj's house is a weathered,
yet sturdy cottage nestled at the edge of Hearthstone.
Its timbered walls are worn with age, and the roof, patched in places, is thick with moss.
The front porch is cluttered with an assortment of tools, jars of dried herbs, and an odd collection of knick-knacks.
There is a fireplace here.

name: Road near Hearthstone
description:
The Road near Hearthstone winds gently through lush meadows and wooded glades,
offering peaceful views of the surrounding countryside.
Paved with cobblestones that have worn smooth over the years,
it's flanked by wildflowers and tall grasses that sway in the breeze.

name: Turney Farm
description:
A nice, quiet, farm house in the country-side.
Looks like a good place for a read.

name: The Stumbling Goat
description: A humorous, rustic tavern with a quirky feel, often the heart of village gossip.

name: Road east of Wrenwood
description:
You travel miles east of Wrenwood.
It looks like another town is nearby

name: Belleville
description:
At the center of Belleville lies a modest square,
dominated by an ancient oak tree whose gnarled branches stretch wide,
casting dappled shadows over the market stalls below.

name: Ye Ol'e Dog House
description: A quaint small shop known for its ice cream.

name: Belleville Public Library
description:
A public library for old and young.
A good place for a read.
There is a fireplace here.

name: Belleville Church
description: A beautiful local church.
